::Master Fe-ling::

Fe-Ling looks at Koj "if you fight the gestalt you will lose."

::Koj::

Koj looks shocked "what"


::Fe-Ling::

"How are going to face him as a Titan or as 5 robots?"

::Koj::

Five Vs. 2

::Fe-ling::

Whacks Koj on the head "One Vs two is better odds Your trainning is still 
not complete Follow me boy?" Walks off into the forest "Lesson 1 Walking on 
Water." Fe-ling walks on water to the other side.


::Koj::

Koj takes one step and sinks like a rock.


::Fe-ling::

"This is going to be a long trainning day."
